Hello, Welcome to my Github page

About Me

I am a Computer Science And Engineering Undergraduate at Motilal Nehru National Institute of Technology, Allahabad, India.

Machine learning and linux are the love of my life.

Repositories

You can view all my repositories

here

  • Machine Learning

    This repository contains machine learning codes in python, octave and MATLAB programming languages of the machine learning problems that I have solved.

  • Programming Tools 2

    Solutions to the lab assignments of the programming tools-2 lab of my college. These are C programs involving basic linux system calls

  • Playground

    I created this repository to accomodate my random codes, So that my github doesn't become a junkyard. It contains codes varying from algorithms in C to applescripts for automation on a mac to bash scripts which does a dictionary search for possible solutions of a quiz.

    • My Blog

    I seldom write about my experiences in programming and anything that might be of help to anyone. My blog is called Project Sirius
